page.title: 02HOUSING IN PENCAITLAND
page.content: Pencaitland is divided into east and west.West Pencaitland is mainly council housing and East Pencaitland is mainly private.{Council Housing}_ Mostly semi_detatched cottage type with some two_storey semi_detatched also.Sheltered housing is at present being built.{Private Housing}_ Recent developments in East Pencaitland are of semi_detatched chalet type and detatched bungalows.In West Pencaitland large villas built approx. 100 yrs. ago line the main street.Some names include Bowmont,Deanwood and St. Michaels Lodge.Planning permission has been granted to build approx. 250 private houses in the field next to the Smiddy Inn.There is some opposition to this in the village.
